Interface uci.graph.GraphEdgeRenderer

  Summary 

public interface  GraphEdgeRenderer
{
          // Methods 1
     public abstract FigEdge getFigEdgeFor(GraphModel, Layer, Object);
}

An interface for FigEdge factories. Similiar in concept to the Swing class TreeCellRenderer.

See Also: DefaultGraphEdgeRenderer, uci.graph.demo.TranscriptionRenderer
